field.name: summary
field.value: Grid viewcomponent: fix for empty section is not rendered between header and footer

field.name: description
field.value: When using the grid component with an empty source, the sections are rendered in the following order: tablestart header footer tableend empty Doesn't the empty section should go between the header and the footer? This patch changes the grid to do that, so it gets in this order: tablestart header empty footer tableend This does mean that the empty section must be like grid has no data Then again, maybe it is intended behavior to show the empty section all the way at the bottom?
